column1: Household Income and Wealth, Australia: Summary of Results, 2019–20
Table 13.10  GROSS HOUSEHOLD INCOME, States and territories, Rest of state(a)
Income per week at top of selected percentiles
Ratio of incomes at top of selected income percentiles

Cells in this table containing 2019–20 data have been randomly adjusted (by perturbation) to avoid the release of confidential data. Discrepancies may occur between sums of the component items and totals. Differences may occur between tables only where estimates are produced for different units (e.g. person, household or expenditure units). See Methodology for more information
(a) Estimates compiled based on Rest of State quintile boundaries
(b) Includes NT households. NT estimates are not shown separately since estimates for the NT other than Darwin are not considered reliable. Does not include ACT. See Methodology for more information
(c) Lowest income quintile excluding the first and second percentiles. See Methodology for more information
